name: Trivial Pursuit 3rd Edition
overview: The game involves answering questions in English on one of six subject categories to gain moves, and answering questions on special squares to gain one of the six 'Wedges' you need to gain the right to take on the final winning question. An update to previous releases including the new categories from the 3rd Edition board game and all new questions. New Catagories are Broadcasting, Publishing, News, Life and Times, Silver Screen and R.P.M. A part of 6 can all play together!
